active.name: Mana Made Real
active.effects: For 8 seconds, your mana is ''Empowered''. While ''Empowered'': your [[champion ability|abilities]] cost 100% more mana; you gain 15% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 100 '''bonus''' mana)}} increased ability damage, {{tip|healing}}, and {{tip|shielding}}; and your basic ability cooldowns progress 30% faster.
